alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 2:55PM EST until February 22 at 4:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 4 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Branch and Hillsdale Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 4 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Slippery travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the latter part of the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will arrive from south to north shortly after sunrise. By the early afternoon, temperatures are expected to gradually warm above freezing such that the freezing rain risk will diminish.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Untreated bridges and overpasses will be the first surfaces to freeze.
